name: AESDEC128KL
description: Perform Ten Rounds of AES Decryption Flow With Key Locker Using 128-BitKey

instructionTypes.supportsCompatMode: Decrypt xmm using 128-bit AES key indicated by handle at m384 and store result in xmm.

longDescription: The AESDEC128KL1 instruction performs 10 rounds of AES to decrypt the first operand using the 128-bit key indicated by the handle from the second operand. It stores the result in the first operand if the operation succeeds (e.g., does not run into a handle violation failure).
flagsAffected: ZF is set to 0 if the operation succeeded and set to 1 if the operation failed due to a handle violation. The other arithmetic flags (OF, SF, AF, PF, CF) are cleared to 0.
